Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier track condition at Logan Square.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier track condition at Logan Square.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Lake
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Lake due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Lake due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
